overview: Memories of super8 film found in my grandparents' basement, revived through successful organic manipulation with chemical experiments using fruit and vegetable scraps, the favourite of my Grandmother (Marigold, Red Cabbage, Blueberries, Peony, Red Roses)  The sound was obtained from old avant-garde poems that my grandmother used to record, re-processed with the use of a magnetophone.
title: FILM A FIORI
